settings.content: TERRA Newborn Nappies are lovingly crafted to give your baby the gentle beginning they deserve. TERRA Nappies are soft, breathable, and ultra-absorbent, keeping your newborn dry and comfortable through every little moment. Made with safe, plant-based materials and dermatologically tested for sensitive skin, they're as gentle as your touch.

settings.prepaid_continue_as_standard_text: Becomes a regular subscription after {count} orders

settings.heading: Ingredients¬†
settings.content:
• Absorbent core made with premium Japanese materials for superior dryness.
  • 100% FSC-certified natural wood pulp from the USA.
  • Soft tissue layers for extra comfort and absorption.
  • Breathable backsheet made from biodegradable bamboo fibre.
  • Gentle leg cuffs made from biodegradable bamboo fibre (not bamboo viscose).
  • Leak-proof layer made from eco-friendly corn starch.
  • Front tape made from baby-safe, food-grade material.
  • Soft topsheet made from food-grade material.
  • Wetness indicator made from 100% plant-based materials.
  • Printed with non-toxic, food-grade inks.
  • Recyclable kraft paper packaging with rice-based materials.

settings.heading: Key Features of TERRA Nappy
settings.content:
• Breathable Bamboo Back Sheet - Made from 100% biodegradable bamboo fibre for all-day comfort and airflow.
  • Smart Wetness Indicator - Clearly shows when it's time for a change, ensuring freshness and convenience.
  • 12+ Hours of Dryness - Advanced absorption keeps your baby dry, comfortable, and rash-free through day and night.
  • Dermatologically rated 'Excellent' - Safe, gentle, and suitable for even the most sensitive skin.
  • Super Absorbent Core - Crafted with 100% USA natural wood pulp and Japanese SAP for superior leak protection.
  • 3D Leak Guard Technology - Secure fit and crevice leg design actively prevent leaks and side spills.
  • Ultra-Soft High-Back Waistband - Offers a secure, flexible fit to support movement and crawling comfort.

settings.heading: Delivery  and  return policy
settings.content:
Our team will¬†ship your order within 5 business days. The time it takes to receive your order depends on the shipping method chosen at checkout.¬†

We hope you to love it, but if you need to make a return, breathe easy. Returns are always free and can be done in person or by mail.¬†

settings.heading: Find the Perfect Fit

settings.text: From newborn snuggles to toddler tumbles, our easy size chart helps you choose the right Terra Nappy for every stage. Gentle, comfy, and planet-friendly, because every baby deserves the perfect fit.

settings.heading: Video scene
A New Generation of Plant-Based Nappies
CIRCULAR BY DESIGN

settings.text:
We design for the end from the very start.
Every part of our packaging is¬†paper-based, recyclable or compostable, and plastic-free down to the cloth core. Even¬†off-cuts are re-purposed, turned into¬†fish bait, cleaning pads, or donated to local kindergartens¬†for crafts.

settings.heading: A New Generation of Plant-Based Nappies
MADE THE NATURAL WAY

settings.text:
We took a different path, building our own dedicated manufacturing network and long-term local partners, so we know exactly¬†where and how every part is made.

We choose¬†only naturally processed materials¬†and¬†source ingredients locally wherever possible, reducing transport miles while ensuring¬†complete traceability, safety, and freshness.

This level of control is how we make sure¬†every product truly reflects our values, from the very first fibre to the final pack.

settings.heading: Follow @terra.co.nz
Frequently Asked Questions

settings.text: Explore answers to the most common questions about Terra Nappies, crafted to give you clarity and confidence.

settings.heading: What makes Terra nappies different from regular nappies?
settings.content: Terra nappies are crafted from up to 85% plant-based materials, including bamboo fibre and FSC-certified wood pulp. They're free of harsh chemicals, plastics, and synthetic fragrances, offering a safer, more sustainable alternative to conventional nappies.

settings.heading: Are Terra Newborn nappies safe for sensitive skin?
settings.content: Yes, Terra Newborn nappies are dermatologically tested and rated "excellent," making them suitable for all skin types. They contain no chlorine, latex, parabens, fragrances, or other common irritants.

settings.heading: Are Terra Newborn nappies biodegradable?
settings.content: Terra Newborn nappies contain biodegradable components, such as bamboo fibre, and a plant-based absorbent core. While they are not fully compostable due to hygiene regulations, they break down faster than traditional nappies, helping reduce long-term environmental impact.

settings.heading: How long can my baby wear a Terra Newborn nappy?
settings.content: Terra Newborn Nappies are designed to keep your baby dry for up to 12 hours. The high-performance, plant-based absorbent core provides reliable protection for both daytime use and overnight comfort.

settings.heading: Do Terra nappies have a wetness indicator?
settings.content: Yes, Terra nappies feature a plant-based wetness indicator that changes colour as moisture increases, making it easy to know when it's time for a change.

settings.heading: What sizes do Terra nappies come in?
settings.content: Terra nappies are available in a full range of sizes, from newborn to toddler.

settings.heading: How do I choose the right size nappy for my baby?
settings.content: Check your baby's weight and use the size chart on the packaging. If you notice leaks or red marks around the legs or waist, consider sizing up.

settings.heading: How often should I change my baby's nappy?
settings.content: At the Newborn stage, babies typically need 5 - 6 nappy changes a day. Always change a soiled nappy promptly to maintain skin health and comfort.

settings.heading: Why are Terra Newborn Nappies ideal for babies on the move?
settings.content: Terra Newborn Nappies are designed with an ultra-soft waistband, snug leg cuffs made from 100% bamboo fibre, and a flexible fit that moves with your baby. The 3D leak guards and super-absorbent core provide extra protection during rolling, crawling, and playing.

settings.heading: What nappy size should I choose for my crawling baby?
settings.content: If your baby is crawling and weighs up to 5kg (11 Lbs), Terra Newborn Nappies are the perfect fit. For the most accurate sizing, we recommend using our nappy size chart on the website to find the best fit for your baby's needs.

settings.heading: Are Terra Newborn Nappies suitable for overnight use?
settings.content: Yes, with up to 12 hours of absorbency, Terra Newborn Nappies offer all-night dryness ideal for naps and uninterrupted sleep.

settings.heading: Do Terra Newborn Nappies help reduce the risk of nappy rash?
settings.content: Yes, our breathable bamboo-based materials and chemical-free design help reduce moisture build-up and irritation, which are common triggers of nappy rash.

settings.heading: How do Terra Newborn Nappies support movement and comfort?
settings.content: Terra Newborn nappies are designed with a soft, stretchy waistband and side panels that adapt to your baby's every move without digging in or slipping.

settings.heading: Are Terra Newborn Nappies easy to change on an active baby?
settings.content: Yes, Terra Newborn Nappies come with flexible tabs and a secure fit system, making nappy changes easier even when your baby's on the go.

settings.heading: Can Terra Newborn Nappies handle heavier wetting at this stage?
settings.content: Absolutely, the sustainable, plant-based core and advanced leak protection are engineered to absorb more effectively as your baby's output increases.

settings.heading: Is the Terra Newborn Nappies packaging eco-friendly too?
settings.content: Yes, Terra Newborn nappies packaging is made from recyclable craft paper and rice-based materials, aligned with our commitment to reducing plastic use.
